title: NGS Library Prep-8 Samples
author: Opentrons
description:
With this protocol, your robot can perform a part of the NGS library prep on 8 samples based on our Omega Bio-tek Mag-Bind® TotalPure NGS protocol.
See Additional Notes for protocol setup.

You will need:
 P50 Multi-channel Pipette
 12-well Trough
 96-well PCR Plate
 Bio-Rad Hardshell 96-well PCR Plate
 Magnetic Module
 TipOne 200 uL Tip Rack
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer and mix 16 uL AMPure XP Beads to 20 uL of PCR samples on the Magnetic Module.
After 2 minutes of incubation, magnetic module will be engaged and robot will remove supernatant.
Robot will wash the beads twice with 200 uL of 70% ethanol.
Robot will dry the beads for 5 minutes at room temperature.
Robot will resuspend the beads in 20 uL of H2O.
After 5 minutes of incubation, magnetic module will transfer supernatant to a clean output plate in slot 2.
notes:
Protocol Setup:
Make sure your reagents are setup as follows before the protocol begins.


If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: NGS Library Prep-8 Samples
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
With this protocol, your robot can perform a part of the NGS library prep on 8 samples based on our [Omega Bio-tek Mag-Bind® TotalPure NGS protocol](./omega_biotek_magbind_totalpure_NGS).

See Additional Notes for protocol setup.

---

You will need:
* P50 Multi-channel Pipette
* 12-well Trough
* 96-well PCR Plate
* Bio-Rad Hardshell 96-well PCR Plate
* Magnetic Module
* TipOne 200 uL Tip Rack
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
6. Robot will transfer and mix 16 uL AMPure XP Beads to 20 uL of PCR samples on the Magnetic Module.
7. After 2 minutes of incubation, magnetic module will be engaged and robot will remove supernatant.
8. Robot will wash the beads twice with 200 uL of 70% ethanol.
9. Robot will dry the beads for 5 minutes at room temperature.
10. Robot will resuspend the beads in 20 uL of H2O.
11. After 5 minutes of incubation, magnetic module will transfer supernatant to a clean output plate in slot 2.
markdown.notes:
Protocol Setup:

Make sure your reagents are setup as follows before the protocol begins.

![setup](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/1495/setup.png)

---

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
